Edges-Blessed -- Female Veteran Adventurer
Attributes (9 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d10 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes: Young+: -2 Attribute Points
Skills (10 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Language (English): (sma) d4 Riding: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Shooting: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d10 Stealth: (agi) d4
Skill Notes:
Young+: -2 Skill Points
True Believer: May reroll Faith
Size: -1 Deity: None
Advances: 8 Improvement Points: 20 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 8
Description Notes: Small: -1 Size
Features
Edges (5 points): Arcane Background (Blessed); Flock; New Powers; Power Points; True Believer Hindrances: Stubborn; Vow; Young+ Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Young+: Has Small feature/+2 Benny each session
Arcane Background (Blessed): Violating core beliefs inflicts -2 Faith for 1 wk; major sins remove powers
Flock: Has 5 townsfolk followers
Stubborn: Never admits error
Vow: Has broad restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 4 (2) Cover: 2 Toughness: 7 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Light Armored Duster Shield: Medium Native Shield Weapons: Bayonet (d8+d4); Double-Barrel Shotgun (3d6 R12"); Springfield Rifled Musket (2d8 R15"); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Small: -1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 20
Powers:
Arcane Protection: (1 PP) R6" Foes suffer -2 (Raise -4) on arcane attacks and damage against target for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Fly: (3 PP) R6" Target gains fly Pace 12 (Raise Pace 24) for 5 rd (+2 PP/additional target)
Mind Link: (1 PP) R6" Two targets communicate up to 1 mile telepathically (Raise 5 miles) for 30 min (+1 PP/additional target)
Puppet: (3 PP) R6" Target obeys self (Raise complete control) for 5 rd (Spirit neg) (+1 PP Self can use target senses; +2 PP/additional target)
Summon Ally: (2+ PP) R6" Creates obedient servant for 5 rd (+1 PP Servant can bite/claw for Str+d6 damage; +2 PP Servant has fly Pace 12; +1 PP Self can use servant's senses)
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Blessed): 3 Powers/15 Power Points/Critical failure causes fatigue
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +5 Power Points
